metadata.titleEn: Whole rock and single mineral geochemical data of Donggushan biotite granite in central Anhui Province
metadata.titleCn: 安徽中部东顾山黑云母花岗岩全岩及单矿物地球化学数据
metadata.description: The data are the whole rock major, trace element and Pb isotopic geochemical data of donggushan biotite granite in central Anhui Province, as well as in-situ Hf isotopic data of zircon, major, trace element and Sr isotopic data of scheelite and S isotopic data of pyrite. The samples are from donggushan biotite granite in central Anhui Province. The major element data were obtained by XRF analysis, the trace element data were obtained by ICP-MS analysis, and the Pb isotopic composition data were obtained by ICP-MS analysis. Zircon U-Pb dating and in situ Lu Hf isotopic composition data were obtained by la-mc-icp-ms analysis. The major elements of scheelite were obtained by jxa8230 electron microprobe analysis, the trace elements by LA-ICP-MS analysis, and the in-situ Sr isotope of scheelite by MC-ICP-MS analysis. S isotope of pyrite was obtained by MC-ICP-MS analysis. The above data have been published in high-level SCI journals, and the data are true and reliable. The obtained data can be used to study the source, evolution and metallogenic process of donggushan tungsten deposit.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为安徽中部东顾山黑云母花岗岩的全岩主、微量元素、Pb同位素地球化学数据，以及锆石原位Hf同位素数据，白钨矿主微量、Sr同位素数据，黄铁矿S同位素数据。样品采自安徽中部东顾山黑云母花岗岩。全岩主量元素数据由XRF分析获得，微量元素数据由ICP-MS分析获得，Pb同位素组成数据由ICP-MS分析获得。锆石U-Pb定年及原位Lu-Hf同位素组成数据由LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得。白钨矿主量元素由JXA8230型电子探针分析获得，微量元素由LA-ICP-MS分析获得，白钨矿原位Sr同位素由MC-ICP-MS分析获得。黄铁矿S同位素由MC-ICP-MS分析获得。以上数据已发表于高级别SCI期刊，数据真实可靠。通过获得的数据，可以研究东顾山钨矿成矿流体的来源、演化和成矿过程。
metadata.instructions: The geochemical data are stored in Excel format, and the sample name is "YY DD", where YY is the sampling year and DD is the sample ordinal number
metadata.instructionsCn: 地球化学数据以Excel格式存储，样品名称为“yy-dd”，其中yy为采样年份，dd为样品序数

literatureList.titleEn: Genesis of the Donggushan tungsten polymetallic deposit, central Anhui Province: A clue of diagenetic and metallogenic system of a crustal source
literatureList.referenceEn: Cheng, T., Yang, X.Y., Lee I., Wang, L.H., & Zhang, Q. M. (2021). Genesis of the Donggushan tungsten polymetallic deposit, central Anhui Province: A clue of diagenetic and metallogenic system of a crustal source. Ore Geology Reviews 134  104163. doi: 10.1016/j.oregeorev.2021.104163

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of data collection methods used for geochemical analysis of granitoid rocks?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供用于花岗岩岩石地球化学分析的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of data collection methods used for geochemical analysis of granitoid rocks includes the use of XRF for whole-rock major element analysis, ICP-MS for trace element and Pb isotope composition, and LA-MC-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotope composition.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于花岗岩岩石地球化学分析的数据收集方法的一个例子包括使用XRF进行全岩主要元素分析，使用ICP-MS进行微量元素和铅同位素组成分析，以及使用LA-MC-ICP-MS进行锆石U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成分析。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific characteristics and analytical methods used to measure the geochemical properties of biotite granite in the context of mineralization processes?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在矿化过程的背景下，测量黑云母花岗岩的地球化学特征和分析方法有哪些具体特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock major element data, trace element data, Pb isotopic compositions, zircon U-Pb dating, in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic compositions, major elements in scheelite, trace elements in scheelite, in-situ Sr isotopes, pyrite S isotopes
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩主元素数据，微量元素数据，铅同位素组成，锆石U-Pb定年，原位Lu-Hf同位素组成，白钨矿中的主元素，白钨矿中的微量元素，原位Sr同位素，黄铁矿S同位素。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many types of isotopic data are obtained from the rock samples in a dataset related to Anhui Central Donggushan biotite granite?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 与安徽中央东姑山黑云母花岗岩相关的数据集中，从岩石样本中获得了多少种同位素数据？

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the data collection methods used to analyze the geochemical composition of biotite granite in the context of mineralization studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在矿化研究中，用于分析黑云母花岗岩的地球化学成分的数据收集方法有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: The data collection methods include XRF analysis for whole-rock major elements, ICP-MS for trace elements and Pb isotopic composition, LA-MC-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic composition, JXA8230 electron probe for wolframite major elements, LA-ICP-MS for wolframite trace elements, MC-ICP-MS for in-situ Sr isotopic composition in wolframite, and MC-ICP-MS for S isotopic composition in pyrite.
Definition.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法包括：全岩主要元素的XRF分析、微量元素和铅同位素组成的ICP-MS、锆石U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成的LA-MC-ICP-MS、钨矿主要元素的JXA8230电子探针、钨矿微量元素的LA-ICP-MS、钨矿原位锶同位素组成的MC-ICP-MS，以及黄铁矿的硫同位素组成的MC-ICP-MS。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of collecting and analyzing geochemical data of whole rock, minerals, and isotopes from biotite granite in central Anhui?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集和分析来自安徽中部的黑云母花岗岩的全岩、矿物和同位素的地球化学数据的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of collecting and analyzing geochemical data of whole rock, minerals, and isotopes from biotite granite in central Anhui is to study the source, evolution, and metallogenic processes of the Donggushan tungsten ore-forming fluids. This data aids in understanding the geochemical characteristics and isotopic compositions that inform the formation and development of mineral deposits in this region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集和分析来自安徽中部的黑云母花岗岩的全岩、矿物和同位素的地球化学数据，旨在研究东姑山钨矿成矿流体的来源、演化和成矿过程。这些数据有助于理解该地区矿床形成和发展的地球化学特征和同位素组成。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the instrumental and procedural considerations for obtaining comprehensive geochemical and isotopic data from biotite granite formations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 获取生物云母花岗岩形成的全面地球化学和同位素数据的仪器和程序考虑因素是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Comprehensive geochemical and isotopic data from biotite granite formations can be obtained using several instrumental and procedural techniques. Major element data for whole rock samples are typically acquired through X-ray fluorescence (XRF) analysis. Trace element and Pb isotopic compositions are determined using Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry (ICP-MS). Zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic compositions are analyzed using Laser Ablation Multi-Collector ICP-MS (LA-MC-ICP-MS). For wolframite, major element analysis is conducted using an electron microprobe (JXA8230), trace elements are measured by LA-ICP-MS, and in-situ Sr isotopic data is acquired using MC-ICP-MS. Pyrite S isotopic data is also obtained using MC-ICP-MS. These methods allow for the investigation of the source, evolution, and mineralization processes of the ore-forming fluids in such formations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 来自生物云母花岗岩形成的综合地球化学和同位素数据可以通过多种仪器和程序技术获得。全岩样品的主要元素数据通常通过X射线荧光（XRF）分析获得。微量元素和铅同位素组成则使用感应耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）进行测定。锆石U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成通过激光剥蚀多收集ICP-MS（LA-MC-ICP-MS）进行分析。对于钨矿，主要元素分析使用电子探针（JXA8230）进行，微量元素通过LA-ICP-MS测量，原位锶同位素数据则使用MC-ICP-MS获取。黄铁矿的硫同位素数据也通过MC-ICP-MS获得。这些方法使得研究这种形成中的矿化流体的来源、演化和矿化过程成为可能。
